body: I think beiwei30 and me both have clarified this issue. It shouldn't be caused by dubbo's NettyHelper.
We need more information to resolve this issue. Feel free to reopen if necessary.
Please provide your demo code that can reproduce your problem and reopen this issue, if necessary.

>我在kryo基础上还加入了twitter chill，支持Java的同时，还能比较完美的支持Scala，让Scala童鞋也能享受dubbo直接支持数据类型的快感，如何分享

@superleo-cn ,can you give your code repository?

>我们使用scala + dubbo 一年了。 dubbo的hession2对Scala数据类型非常不好，发布吃了不少苦头，差点整个Facade都打算退回到Java了，核心Service只用Scala。后来研究发现了Kryo+Chill能比较完美的解决这个问题，推荐你试试。
--

I think you can refine a base dependency for scala-dubbo . As a project,we can put into the github.com/dubbo
@teclxl @chickenlj would you mind to take a look at https://github.com/beiwei30/incubator-dubbo/commit/030ebcea51603b955330059814fa95601f5dd1f6? I made an experimental change to solve this issue.

I think we should have a guidance of how dubbo can be deployed in docker or K8S.

Dubbo itself should also learn from Service Mesh, learn how to cooperate with fundamental infrastructures like K8S.

确实，当我将max.total设置成100时，就好了。
但是我不理解为什么需要这么多！

ps. 用Redission换掉Jedis怎么样，redis各类集群基本都支持了
@ganxinhu, thanks for your analysis, so it sounds like FST's cache will expand but never shrink. FST community also reports the similar issue, let's keep this issue open.
